name: project-tracking-management-system
description: A comprehensive full-stack web application for tracking and managing government projects across different regions
author: Project Tracking Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.db:seed: cd database/seeds && cat *.sql | mysql -u root -p project_tracking
scripts.db:migrate: cd database/migrations && for %f in (*.sql) do mysql -u root -p project_tracking < %f
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
